basic.description:
{Basic Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 1 square further into the shroud and increases land movement points by 50 per level

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 3 square further into the shroud and increases land movement points by 50 per level

expert.description:
{Expert Scouting}

Allows your hero to see 5 square further into the shroud and increases land movement points by 50 per level
